com.github.shynixn.blockball.api.business.service

Interface ItemService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ItemServiceImpl

    public ItemService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <I> I createItemStack(MaterialType materialType, int dataValue, int amount)
      Creates a new itemStack from the given materialType amount.
      <M> M getMaterialFromMaterialType(MaterialType materialType)
      Gets the material from the material type. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if mapping is not possible.
      <M> M getMaterialFromNumericValue(int value)
      Gets the material from the numeric value. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if the numeric value could not get applied to a material.
      <M> int getNumericMaterialValue(M material)
      Gets the numeric material value. Throws a IllegalArgumentException if the numeric value could not get located.
      <I> void setSkin(I itemStack, java.lang.String skin)
      Sets the skin of the given itemStack.
